feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:15 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -22.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 08:49 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -22.4°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -25.1°C
Wind: NNE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 late this afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
